name: Worlde Lande X: Masse
description:
Worlde Lande X: Masse The prequel to the classic hit game that everyone definitely played, Worlde Lande Countrie!

Every Christmas, Worlde Lande Manne becomes Worlde Lande Clause, and gives prezzies to all the little mates. However, this year, he left the prezzies out for too long! Now he only has 20* seconds to find them before they turn mouldy! Will Worlde Lande Clause be quick enough to find the prezzies, or will Christmas be ruined forever? There's only one way to find out!

*The amount of time you have depends on the dificulty you chose at the start of the game.

This game uses the following music:

"NewsSting" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/



Features:
  • 3 (technically 4) Thrilling Missions!
  • A legendary story told  through amazing cutscenes!
  • 4 Bonus Challenges!
Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump/Shoot Prezzies (Mission 2 & Golden Challenge 2 Only)
